sentence.Network_en: In stoppage time , Carvalho picked a needless booking , tetchily kicking the ball away at a free - kick.
sentence.Network_cn: 补时阶段, 卡瓦略领取不必要的黄牌, 他在对方获得 任意球 时将球踢飞泄愤.

means.word_mean: 1. in an ill-natured and tetchy manner;

sentences.sentence: "`Are you sure?' he asked her tetchily"

auth_sentence.content: "It's an illusion," says Skrillex, tetchily, in response to the general criticism.
